pkgmetadata.longdescription: Moment Condition Based Estimation of Linear Dynamic Panel Data Models // Linear dynamic panel data modeling based on linear and nonlinear moment conditions as proposed by Holtz-Eakin, Newey, and Rosen (1988) doi:10.2307/1913103, Ahn and Schmidt (1995) doi:10.1016/0304-4076(94)01641-C, and Arellano and Bover (1995) doi:10.1016/0304-4076(94)01642-D. Estimation of the model parameters relies on numerical optimization and the computation of closed form solutions. For inference and specification testing, Windmeijer (2005) doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2004.02.005 corrected standard errors, serial correlation tests, tests for overidentification, and Wald tests are available.
